(Ok, like, I forget where I last left off with the Dark Lavacons, I think t=
hey were heading for the new base coordinates or something, so I'll pickup =
from there)

::Dark Lavacons::

        Astral, Fenox, Starlight, Griplash =
and Recklessa continued flying until the Iron Fist came in view.

        A=
stral opened his com to Zardus.

       "Zardus, this is Astral reporting, =
we are heading for the," Astral thinks to himself-pretty nice base," We're =
heading for the Iron Fist," He said.

       Astral looked back at the othe=
rs.

      "Check out this beauty!  It's location also provides military st=
rategy!" He said.

      They flew down, and then, entered the Iron Fist.
